An undead scourge is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ with a bluish-white metal blade that emits a faint glow. These used to be weapons of [Pharasmin](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) undead slayers only, but the slayers have since shared these daggers with the Knights of Lastwall.
